pages.text: $(li)Crocodile Scutes can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:armors/crocodile_chestplate)Crocodile Chestplate$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can only be dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crocodile)Crocodiles$(/l) upon death or when a Baby Crocodile grows into a Crocodile.
